title.no: Gratis elektrisk harmonium lydbibliotek plugin (Elektrisk Salmesykkel)
title.en: Free electric harmonium sample plugin (Elektrisk Salmesykkel)

content.no:
[Elektrisk Salmesykkel](products/elektrisk-salmesykkel/) er et gratis lydbibliotek for Decent Sampler som inneholder lyder fra et [Yamaha L-20D elektrisk harmonium / reed organ](equipment/instruments/yamaha-l-20d/) med noen ekstra funksjoner.
Instrument presets: Lydbiblioteket inneholder 2 presets, den ordinære “ElektriskSalmesykkel” (best i de fleste tilfeller) og en loop-basert preset “ElektriskSalmesykkel (Looped)”. Med den ordinære har hver sample omtrent 16 sekunders varighet. For å få best mulig loop-punkt er noen av samplene korte og andre er lengre, i den loop-baserte preset'en. Noen av disse vil også ha artifakter med loop-punktet. For best mulig lydkvalitet bør du alltid bruke den ordinære preset'en ved mindre du trenger toner som varer lengre enn 16 sekunder i strekk.
Brukergrensesnitt: Brukergrensesnittet lar deg kontrollere alle aspektene ved instrumentet og effektene. Utforsk parametere for å stille inn lyden din med kontroll over vindforsyning, lydtunger, tremulant, mekanisk støy og romklang.
Normal / Full (Swell): Gradvis åpne opp klaffene til kamrene. Styrt med bruk av kneet på det originale instrumentet og med modulasjonshjulet i plugin'en.
Soft / Loud (Loudness): Bestemmer hvor mye luft som tilføres lydtungene.
Diapason: Åpner kammeret permanent for diapason-lydtungene.
Close: Begge kamrene er lukket.
Viola: Åpner kammeret permanent for bratsj-lydtungene.
Tremulant: Tremulant varierer lufttilførselen til lydtungene. Spakene lar deg justere tremulanten med ønsket styrke og hastighet.
Normal / Tremulant (Depth): Juster styrken til tremulanten.
Slow / Fast (Rate): Juster hastigheten til tremulanten.
Silent / Noisy: Mengden mekanisk støy fra tangentene når man presser dem ned og slipper dem opp.
Reverb: Romklangen er fra en [Chase Bliss Audio & Meris CXM 1978](equipment/effects/chase-bliss-audio-and-meris-cxm-1978/) klang-pedal. Den korte klangen er som er et lite, intimt rom, og den lange er mer som en kirke med lang etterklangstid.
On / Off: Skrur av og på romklang-effekten.
Church / Home: Bytter mellom et stort rom (kirke) et lite rom (hjem).
Dry / Wet: Miks mellom direktelyd (dry) og romklang (wet).
Instrumenter bruk i video: [Dehli Musikk - Elektrisk Salmesykkel](products/elektrisk-salmesykkel/), [Dreadbox Erebus v2](equipment/instruments/dreadbox-erebus-v2/) (synth bass) og Drummer i Logic Pro X spilt inn på kassett.
content.en:
[Elektrisk Salmesykkel](products/elektrisk-salmesykkel/) is a free sample library for Decent Sampler featuring the [Yamaha L-20D electric harmonium / reed organ](equipment/instruments/yamaha-l-20d/) with some added features.
Instrument presets: This sample library includes 2 presets, the regular preset “ElektriskSalmesykkel” (best in most cases) and the looped preset “ElektriskSalmesykkel (Looped)”. For the regular version, each sample are approximately 16 seconds long. For the looped version, to achieve the best possible loop point, some of the loops are short and some are longer. Some of the loops will however have some minor artifacts. For best audio quality, you should always use the regular version. And only if you have notes held for more than 16 seconds, use the the looped version.
User interface: The user interface offers precise control over every aspect of the instrument and effects. Explore parameters to refine your sound, including control over the wind supply, reeds, tremulant, mechanical noise and reverb.
Normal / Full (Swell): Gradually open up the swell chambers. Controlled by a knee lever on the original instrument and with the modulation wheel in the plugin.
Soft / Loud (Loudness): Determines how much air flows through the reeds.
Diapason: Permanently opens the swell chamber for the diapason reeds.
Close: Both swell chambers is closed.
Diapason: Permanently opens the swell chamber for the viola reeds.
Tremulant: Tremulant varies the wind supply to the reeds. The controls enable you to adjust the tremulant with the desired depth and rate.
Normal / Tremulant (Depth): Adjust the depth to introduce subtle or pronounced tremulant effect.
Slow / Fast (Rate): Determines the speed of the tremulant effect.
Silent / Noisy: The amount of mechanical noise from the keys when pressed down and released
Reverb: The reverb are achieved using carefully crafted impulse responses of a [Chase Bliss Audio & Meris CXM 1978 reverb pedal](equipment/effects/chase-bliss-audio-and-meris-cxm-1978/). The short reverb, evoking the intimacy of a small room (home), and the long reverb (church), enveloping your sound in the vastness of a spacious environment.
On / Off: Turns the reverb on and off.
Church / Home: Switches between a long/big room (church) reverb and a short/small room (home) reverb.
Dry / Wet: Mix between direct signal (dry) and reverb signal (wet).
Instrument used in video: [Dehli Musikk - Elektrisk Salmesykkel](products/elektrisk-salmesykkel/), [Dreadbox Erebus v2](equipment/instruments/dreadbox-erebus-v2/) (synth bass) and Drummer in Logic Pro X recorded to cassette tape.

thumbnailDescription: Elektrisk Salmesykkel user interface inside a Yamaha L-20D electric harmonium case

name.en: Closed chambers with low air supply
Closed chambers with high air supply
Gradually opening up the swell chambers

content.no:
Lydsporene for piano, orgel, clavinet and synth fra låta "Ståle Kaasin - To the Top".
Instrumenter: [Hammond C3](equipment/instruments/hammond-c3/), [Hohner Clavinet D6](equipment/instruments/hohner-clavinet-d6/), [Korg MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/), [Korg Polysix](equipment/instruments/korg-polysix/), [Louis Zwicki Pianette](equipment/instruments/louis-zwicki-pianette/), [Roland D-50](equipment/instruments/roland-d-50/), [Sequential Circuits Pro-One](equipment/instruments/sequential-circuits-pro-one/), [Suzuki Omnichord OM-84 System Two](equipment/instruments/suzuki-omnichord-om-84-system-two/) og [Yamaha DX7](equipment/instruments/yamaha-dx7/).
To the Top: Rudi Remme (vokal), Per-Morten Bergseth (trommer), Ståle Kåsin (bass og elektrisk gitar), Benjamin Dehli / Dehli Musikk (tangenter, produksjon og miksing) og Halvor Halvorsen / Juke Joint Studio (mastering).
content.en:
The piano, organ, clavinet and synthesizer parts from the song "Ståle Kaasin - To the Top".
Instruments: [Hammond C3](equipment/instruments/hammond-c3/), [Hohner Clavinet D6](equipment/instruments/hohner-clavinet-d6/), [Korg MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/), [Korg Polysix](equipment/instruments/korg-polysix/), [Louis Zwicki Pianette](equipment/instruments/louis-zwicki-pianette/), [Roland D-50](equipment/instruments/roland-d-50/), [Sequential Circuits Pro-One](equipment/instruments/sequential-circuits-pro-one/), [Suzuki Omnichord OM-84 System Two](equipment/instruments/suzuki-omnichord-om-84-system-two/) and [Yamaha DX7](equipment/instruments/yamaha-dx7/).
To the Top: Rudi Remme (vocals), Per-Morten Bergseth (drums), Ståle Kåsin (bass og electric guitar), Benjamin Dehli / Dehli Musikk (keyboards, production and mixing) and Halvor Halvorsen / Juke Joint Studio (mastering).

thumbnailDescription: A Hammond C3, Hohner Clavinet D6, Korg MS-20, Korg Polysix, Louis Zwicki Pianette, Roland D-50, Sequential Circuits Pro-One, Suzuki Omnichord OM-84 System Two and Yamaha DX7 being played

content.no:
Sender lyden av en [Dubreq Stylophone S-1](equipment/instruments/dubreq-stylophone-s-1/) gjennom en [Korg MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/) og kontrollere pitch og gate med dens external signal processor.
Instrumenter: [Dubreq Stylophone S-1](equipment/instruments/dubreq-stylophone-s-1/) og [Korg MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/).
Effekter: [Korg MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/) ESP preamp, [Hairball Audio FET/RACK Revision D (1176)](equipment/effects/hairball-audio-fet-rack-revision-d/), [Alex Franklinos Stereo Transformer Saturator](equipment/effects/alex-franklinos-stereo-transformer-saturator/), [Fulltone Tube Tape Echo](equipment/effects/fulltone-tube-tape-echo/) og [Chase Bliss Audio & Meris CXM 1978](equipment/effects/chase-bliss-audio-and-meris-cxm-1978/).
content.en:
Running a [Dubreq Stylophone S-1](equipment/instruments/dubreq-stylophone-s-1/) through the [Korg MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/) and controlling its pitch and gate with the external signal processor.
Instruments: [Dubreq Stylophone S-1](equipment/instruments/dubreq-stylophone-s-1/) and [Korg MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/).
Effects: [Korg MS-20](equipment/instruments/korg-ms-20/) ESP preamp, [Hairball Audio FET/RACK Revision D (1176)](equipment/effects/hairball-audio-fet-rack-revision-d/), [Alex Franklinos Stereo Transformer Saturator](equipment/effects/alex-franklinos-stereo-transformer-saturator/), [Fulltone Tube Tape Echo](equipment/effects/fulltone-tube-tape-echo/) and [Chase Bliss Audio & Meris CXM 1978](equipment/effects/chase-bliss-audio-and-meris-cxm-1978/).

thumbnailDescription: A Dubreq Stylophone S-1 and a Korg MS-20 synthesizer being played
